entry.title: How YouTube Keeps Broadcasting Inside Russia's Digital Iron Curtain
entry.content: Russia has fined Google’s video site hundreds of millions of dollars but hasn’t blocked its access, allowing the country’s citizens to view one of the few sources of independent information about the war in Ukraine.

entry.title: Former Colombia Rebel Gustavo Petro Inaugurated as President
entry.content: The new government aims to end the war on drugs, develop the countryside and transition from oil and coal to fight climate change.
